commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<script>
    let title =''

    const onTitleChange = e => {
        titel = e.target.value
    }
</script>

<input
    placeholder="Movie Titel"
    type="text"
    value={titel}
    on:keyup={onTitleChange}
/>
